alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Kenedy County through 515 PM CDT... At 433 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sarita to 10 miles northeast of Armstrong to near U S 77 Border Patrol Station. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Armstrong, Sarita, Kenedy County Wind Farms, U S 77 Border Patrol Station, Kenedy County Sheriffs Office and Armstrong Ranch Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
